text:
Anything which is
`xyx (YC 123) Is Hiring`
is going the Hacker News front page automatically.
Its not at all a secret that Hacker News intentionally puts YCombinator funded startups hiring notice on the front page.
It’s like actually why it exists.

text:
Possibly?
More generally, HackerNews is under no obligation to anyone to be at all consistent or not to self bias.
It is literally managed by 2 people.
They absolutely have well documented and used powers to dump things off the front page; and to lift things back up to the front because they felt they didn’t get a good viewing.
